sentences.english: The rapid development of the information industry has revoked the economical value of the factual information.
sentences.chinese: 信息产业迅猛发展催发了事实信息经济价值的觉醒。

sentences.english: I believe this business will rapidly developed in this five years.
sentences.chinese: 我相信在这五年中，这个行业会迅猛发展的。

sentences.english: The exceptionally fast growth of populations in the suburbs and exurbs.
sentences.chinese: 近郊和远郊人口的迅猛增长。

sentences.english: The study also forecast an explosion in the diet soft-drink market.
sentences.chinese: 该研究还预测低糖软饮料市场将迅猛增长。

sentences.english: The high speed craft shipping enterprises were far swiftly developed in China.
sentences.chinese: 我国高速船航运事业发展十分迅猛。

sentences.english: The result has been a rapid increase in heart surgery.
sentences.chinese: 其结果就使对心脏实行外科手术的病例迅猛地在增强。

sentences.english: Rapid inflation and above curtailments acquired by agitation buying.
sentences.chinese: 迅猛的通货膨胀和抢购造成重大的商品缺乏。

sentences.english: The investment of China in Asia started late but developed rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 中国对亚洲地区投资起步晚，发展迅猛。

sentences.english: The variety in retail results from the dramatical development in retail trade.
sentences.chinese: 业态多样化是零售业迅猛发展的必然结果。

sentences.english: The rapid development of science and technology reflects the status of Moism in the history of scientific culture.
sentences.chinese: 科学技术迅猛发展彰显了墨学在科学文化史上的地位。

sentences.english: The dramatic increase in internet users during the past 10 years has been remarkable to witness.
sentences.chinese: 近10年来互联网用户迅猛增加，凡目睹者无不赞叹。

sentences.english: Foreign trade increased rapidly and there was improvement in the utilization of foreign funds.
sentences.chinese: 外贸进出口增长迅猛，利用外资质量进一步提高。

sentences.english: The key is to "hit hard and hit often."
sentences.chinese: 关键是要“多次出招，招招迅猛”。

sentences.english: The wireless communication revolution has spawned a revival of interest in the design and optimization of radio transceivers.
sentences.chinese: 无线通信的迅猛发展激发了射频收发器设计的热潮。

sentences.english: As industrial development booms, the region is also susceptible to pollution.
sentences.chinese: 随着该地区工业迅猛发展，污染也日益严重。

sentences.english: Under the rapid development of globalization, there is a pace-fast increase in the flowing of world population.
sentences.chinese: 在全球化迅猛发展的当今，人口流动急剧增长。

definition: see 勢不可當|势不可当[shi4 bu4 ke3 dang1]
impossible to resist (idiom); an irresistible force
like a hot knife through butter (idiom)/with irresistible force
to clamber up/(of prices etc) to rise
